message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations, offering unparalleled performance and value. We believe its worth extends well beyond its tangible features, making it an invaluable asset for those seeking excellence. For this extraordinary opportunity, we are offering the product at a special introductory price of $2000000. We look forward to discussing how this product can enhance your endeavors.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'd like to make a counteroffer. I'm willing to pay $1500000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the features and value it offers. I'm looking forward to hearing back from you.
